abstract_ssm: Transcript of a speech given by an unidentified Brooklyn municipal representative regarding the presentation of a musket to a soldier in an unidentified company of light infantry. The speech implies that the soldier had fought in the Revolutionary War.
subject_ssm: Military ceremonies, honors, and salutes -- New York (State) -- Kings County

subject_sim: Military ceremonies, honors, and salutes -- New York (State) -- Kings County
